title: Companion Approval Guide
content: IS TO KILL EVERYONE IN THE ZHENTARIM HIDEOUT Astarion +Shadowheart + Karlach - Zarys The Risen Road, Zhentarim Basement - In Waukeen's Rest Barn/Basement. Go to the farm area and go through the Doorway blocked by boxes, get through the guard and get to the Hideout Intimidate Brem for a discount on Oskar's Freedom Free the Artist Requirement/s: Pass the high intimidation roll to force Brem for a discount. Gale +Karlach +Shadowheart +Wyll +Lae'zel + None Brem, Oskar The Risen Road, Zhentarim Base
